typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Client as integer,
		ConArea as string,
		DocNum as string,
		TotCcy as float,
		TotQty as float,
		TotQtyEnter as float,
		ObjNum as string,
		FiscalYear as integer,
		ValueType as string,
		Version as integer,
		CostElem as string,
		SourceObj as string,
		CoID as integer,
		TradingArea as string,
		DebCreInd as string,
		UnitMeasure as string,
		DocItemNum as integer,
		PurDocNum as integer,
		PersonnelNum as integer,
		CoCode as integer,
		ObjClass as string,
		RefDateSet as date,
		TimeCreated as date,
		CountryKey as string,
		Period as integer,
		CcyKey as string,
		PoDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> curatedCostElementFact
curatedCostElementFact filter(@activity('curatedCostElementFact').output.ObjNum == "QL10000003259") ~> Filter1
